code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{login}=useAuth();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await login(username,password);}catch(err){setError(err instanceof Error?err.message:'Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"auth-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Autentificare"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nume utilizator",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Parol\u0103",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Autentificare"})]});};export default Login;
